settings.text_2: Accept the challenge, and immerse yourself in a new mysterious world.

settings.text_2:
Are we all set, Detective?   
Get your red string out – it’s time to figure out what really happened.
settings.text_3: Immerse yourself in a new gripping experience like never before. This is not your ordinary board game, so get ready for some action!

settings.text_2: Our team is ready to answer all your questions!

settings.title: 🎲 Sign up to get 15% off your first order!

settings.deal_desc:
Introducing ‘’Chase a Case’’ - a monthly subscription service, delivered right at your doorstep each month.

Will you be the one to solve this enduring mystery?

settings.html_area: Join us

settings.text_1: A night-in has never been this thrilling! Grab your friends, your partner, or your kids for this new adventure. There’s nothing like the bond formed between detectives working a case.
Lose yourself in a new mysterious world! Get to know the characters, hear their voices, and figure out what secrets they’re hiding. The characters’ destiny is in your hands.
If puzzles and riddles are a joke to you, Chase a Case will throw you a solid challenge! Rack your brain a little and get better with every single game!

settings.name: Susan V.
settings.quote:
More interactive than other games we’ve played. Many different challenges and tools to keep you engaged. Really pulls you in, feels like you really are a part of the Chase A Case world. Perfect for all thrill seekers!

-Susan V.

settings.name: Catherine K. J.
settings.quote:
I’m actually hooked! Can’t wait to receive my next mystery box. The story is so good, I love the mystical vibe, the characters, and how it all ties in at the end. Was not disappointed!

-Adam B.

settings.name: Monica J.
settings.quote:
Played it with the whole family. We were glued to the game from the very first clue! Great quality, attention to detail, plot twists. It really gets you thinking, and you get to do so much more than just reading cases, it’s great.

-Monika J.

settings.name: Anne S.
settings.quote:
As a fan of all things mystery, the first box was an awesome adventure. I will continue my subscription to see what comes in the next one. If you’re looking for a fun way to spend your evening, try this game, you won’t regret it.

-Anne S.

settings.name: Cameron L.
settings.quote:
Not once did I think this was boring. It gets more and more interesting as you get one step closer to solving the case. Crazy events taking place!! I loved the supernatural stuff in the first story.

-Cameron L.

settings.name: Caroline B.
settings.quote:
Instead of reading tons of text, you’re constantly solving puzzles, cracking codes online & offline, figuring out maps and images - it’s full of practical tasks! Perfect for those cold nights in with your friends or a partner.

-Caroline B.

settings.text_1:
You really never know what’s around the corner... A while ago, an unexpected turn of events brought together a group of friends: a sci-fi lover, a true crime aficionado, and a guy who would never run out of theories about what goes on in Area 51. 

All of us ended up in an escape room. And then another one, and another one... It became clear that among other things, we all share one common passion - mystery. After months and months of hard work, Chase A Case was born - a collection of mysteries to keep you up at night.
